mapper.select: WITH GRP AS ( SELECT USER_GRP_ID, USER_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R WHERE USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} ), MENU_GRP AS ( SELECT 'G' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, T01.USER_GRP_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_R T01 JOIN GRP T02 ON (T01.REL_USER_GRP_ID = T02.USER_GRP_ID) UNION ALL SELECT 'G' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, USER_GRP_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_R WHERE REL_USER_GRP_ID = 'ALL' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'U' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, GRP.USER_ID AS ROLE_ID FROM GRP ), MENU_AUTH AS ( SELECT T01.APP_ID AS APP_ID, T01.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, 1, INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1)-1)) AS C_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1) +1, INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2) - INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1)-1)) AS R_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2) + 1, INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3) - INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2)-1)) AS U_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3) + 1, INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,4) - INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3)-1)) AS D_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,4) + 1)) AS E_AUTH FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_PRIV_MENU_R T01 JOIN MENU_GRP T02 ON ( T01.PRIV_RCVR_GBN = T02.PRIV_RCVR_GBN AND T01.PRIV_RCVR_ID = T02.USER_GRP_ID ) GROUP BY T01.APP_ID, T01.MENU_ID ), MENU_AUTH_PATH AS ( SELECT T01.APP_ID , T01.MENU_ID , T01.ICON_CLASS , T01.UP_MENU_ID , T01.MENU_NM , T01.MENU_TYPE, LEVEL AS LEV , T04.C_AUTH , T04.R_AUTH , T04.U_AUTH , T04.D_AUTH , T04.E_AUTH , SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(T01.MENU_ID,'|'),2) AS PATH FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_MENU_M T01 LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU_AUTH T04 ON ( T01.MENU_ID = T04.MENU_ID AND T01.APP_ID = T04.APP_ID ) WHERE T01.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T01.USE_YN = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR T01.UP_MENU_ID = T01.MENU_ID START WITH T04.MENU_ID IS NOT NULL ) , ALL_MENU AS ( SELECT T01.APP_ID , T01.MENU_ID , T01.ICON_CLASS , T01.UP_MENU_ID , T01.MENU_NM , T01.PGM_ID AS SCREEN_ID , LEVEL AS LEV , T01.MENU_TYPE , T01.PGM_ID , T01.SORT_NO , T01.USE_YN AS MENU_USE_YN , T01.MENU_GRP_CD AS MENU_GRP_CD , SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(T01.MENU_ID,'|'),2) AS PATH, SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO,3,'0'),'|'),2) AS CONCAT_SORT_NO , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO,3,'0'),'|'),2),'[^|]+',1,1),'000') AS SORT1 , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO,3,'0'),'|'),2),'[^|]+',1,2),'000') AS SORT2 , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO,3,'0'),'|'),2),'[^|]+',1,3),'000') AS SORT3 , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO,3,'0'),'|'),2),'[^|]+',1,4),'000') AS SORT4 , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO,3,'0'),'|'),2),'[^|]+',1,5),'000') AS SORT5 FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_MENU_M T01 WHERE T01.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T01.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T01.APP_ID = #{appId} CONNECT BY PRIOR T01.MENU_ID = T01.UP_MENU_ID START WITH T01.UP_MENU_ID IS NULL ) SELECT DISTINCT T01.MENU_GRP_CD AS "menuGrpCd", T01.MENU_ID AS "menuId" , T01.ICON_CLASS AS "iconClass" , T01.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , T01.MENU_TYPE AS "menuType", T01.PGM_ID AS "viewId" , T01.UP_MENU_ID AS "upMenuId" , T01.SORT_NO AS "sortNo" , T01.SCREEN_ID AS "screenId" , 'Y' AS MENU_VIEW_YN , T02.C_AUTH , T02.R_AUTH , T02.U_AUTH , T02.D_AUTH , T02.E_AUTH , T01.SORT1 , T01.SORT2 , T01.SORT3 , T01.SORT4 FROM ALL_MENU T01 JOIN MENU_AUTH_PATH T02 ON ( T01.APP_ID = T02.APP_ID AND T01.MENU_ID = T02.MENU_ID ) ORDER BY T01.SORT1 , T01.SORT2, T01.SORT3, T01.SORT4
